attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am a member of the Mecca bingo club I'm really upset and disappointed that the Goveernment has decided to tax Bingo even more heavily than it was before.

Be fair to bingo players CUT THE TAX

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Not to increase Bingo taxes."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21147


Prime Minister's Office
